<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Populate the Project values for the demand in approved state if the project exists</description>
        <name>Populate Project for Demand</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var d = new GlideRecord("dmn_demand");
//d.addQuery("category","strategic");
//d.addQuery("type","project");
d.addQuery("state",8);//state = Approved
d.query();

while(d.next()){
	var project = new GlideRecord("pm_project");
	var enhancement = new GlideRecord("rm_enhancement");
	var change = new GlideRecord("change_request");
	var defect = new GlideRecord("rm_defect");
	
	var rr = d.getValue("related_records");
	if(rr!=null){
		var array = rr.split(',');
		for(var i in array){
			if(project.get(array[i])){
				d.setValue("project", array[i]);
				d.update();
			    break;
			}else if(enhancement.get(array[i])){
				d.setValue("enhancement", array[i]);
				d.update();
			    break;
			}else if(change.get(array[i])){
				d.setValue("change", array[i]);
				d.update();
			    break;
			}else if(defect.get(array[i])){
				d.setValue("defect", array[i]);
				d.update();
			    break;
			}
		}
		
	}
	
}
]]></script>
